sections.title: The Grand Trek
text: $n$ had barely finished stepping both feet inside the dungeon when *WHAM!* the gate slammed down behind $them$.
$n$ looked around and found $them$self in $room-type$ that was $room-condition$. $They$ looked ahead and saw an archway, and inscripted above the arch were the following words:
Feeling $feeling$, $n$ began $their$ trek into the unknown.
